trailingComments.value: Handle root components. the root index is added to nested fragments
to allow them to be rendered before or after their parent fragment

leadingComments.value: Handle root components. the root index is added to nested fragments
to allow them to be rendered before or after their parent fragment

trailingComments.value: Only add new indexes to the queue.
Duplicate indexes will appear at the same time.
Root components are respected by definition.

leadingComments.value: Only add new indexes to the queue.
Duplicate indexes will appear at the same time.
Root components are respected by definition.

trailingComments.value: If no fragment has been defined with `0` we need to add a position to
our host

trailingComments.value:
*
 * Fragment root component. When using the fragmentRoot, nested Fragments start
 * after the parent. This is a curry version of Fragment.
 * @see    Fragment
 * @public
 * @class  FragmentRoot
 * @reactProps {Object} props
 * @reactProps {(ReactElement|ReactElement[])} props.children
 * @reactProps {number} props.order
 * @return {Fragment}
 *   A Fragment component as root
